Angelina Jolie and her youngsters might in addition to had been strolling on a purple carpet right through their night time out on Friday.

The 42-year-old Oscar winner her and ex Brad Pitt‘s youngsters attended the 2017 U.N. Correspondents Affiliation Awards on the Cipriani Wall Side road eating place in New York Town. In spite of the near-freezing temperature, Jolie wore a strapless black and white robe and lengthy black gloves, channeling a glance that brings to thoughts the Golden Age of Hollywood.

She used to be photographed outdoor along with her sons Pax, 14, and Knox, nine, who wore black fits, and 12-year-old daughter Zahara, who wore a black most sensible and matching pants, and her 11-year-old sister Shiloh, who sported a black tux.
